item.description:
Again, time for some easy top rope and lead climbing, this time at Crow Hill in Leominster, MA. For information on Crow Hill, please see rockclimbing.com ( http://www.rockclimbing.com/routes/North_America/United_States/Massachusetts/Metro-West_and_Central/Crow_Hill/ ), and mountainproject.com ( http://www.mountainproject.com/v/crow-hill/105905492 ).  We'll try to set up over at Boardwalk, or Tom's Dilemma.  (Park map: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/trails/leominster.pdf ).

If the weather is poor, we won't be climbing.

Open to all levels and abilities, but especially for beginners who know at least how to belay, have shoes, harness, and helmet.  It is also great for folks starting to trad leading on rock.  Bring shoes, harness, helmet, belay devices, locking carabiners, rope, rack, etc.  Please make sure to label your gear.

Meetup at the cars in the climber's parking lot, or if you are late, at the cliff.

From Rt. 2 East:

Take Exit 28 to Rt. 31 South
Travel 1.3 miles to office building entrance on left
Travel another .07 of a mile to park entrance on left
After park office, travel 1.0 to off-season parking lot, and another 0.3 miles to the gravel climber's parking lot.
item.name: Crow Hill
